fullText: Lloyd Webber's musical adaptation of the 2003 film is a crowd-pleasing romp that strikes all the right chords with audiences looking for feel-good entertainment.
dtliExcerpt: Lloyd Webber's musical adaptation of the 2003 film is a crowd-pleasing romp that strikes all the right chords with audiences looking for feel-good entertainment.
bwwExcerpt: While paying his respects to that manic role model, Alex Brightman maintains his own appealing brand of scruffy charm as Dewey Finn, amiably ceding the spotlight to a cast of super-talented kids who rock out on the kind of songs you always wished had been in the movie...Thankfully, nothing savage has been done to the original film story - except to lay on the energetic rock songs that people tend to remember as having been in the movie.
showScoreExcerpt: Lloyd Webber's musical adaptation of the 2003 film is a crowd-pleasing romp that strikes all the right chords with audiences looking for feel-good entertainment.
